name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s windController.vcl -t Marabou -o windController.inputquery/ --network controller:controller.onnx

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s windController.vcl -t Agda -o windController.agda --network controller:controller.onnx

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s windController.vcl -t LossFunction -o windController.loss.json --network controller:controller.onnx
